name: Hope (itch) (Pablo García de los Salmones)
description:
How to play:

  • Use A and D or the arrow keys to move
  • Use the Space Bar to throw hope blobs

Description: 

Hope is a game about relationships and how hope keeps us going. 

It is a very tiny game that was born as a concept for a storytelling jam and I ended up developing for a couple of months, mostly during study breaks. Everything in the game was made by me, from code, sprites and animations to music and sound effects.

The game is very short; an average playthrough lasts around 2-3 minutes.

The idea is based on this original comic by Foxes In Love: https://twitter.com/foxes_in_love/status/1218063852417490944

This game is dedicated to my partner, whose priceless support kept me going on with it.
